name: Kvants AI
description: What is the project about? Kvants.ai is building a Decentralized Asset Management platform that tokenizes top-performing AI-Driven trading strategies developed by industry-leading hedge funds. Offering retail investors access to institutional asset management strategies via a fully-compliant and easy-to-use NFT Tokenised Fund Subscription Model. What makes your project unique? ‣ Alpha Version of the Decentralised Asset Management Platform (https://alpha.kvants.ai/) ‣ Platform KYC NFT Mint Live (https://mint.kvants.ai/) ‣ Framework for Tokenised Investment into leading hedge fund strategies. ‣ 9 AI-Driven Strategies Already On-boarded on the Kvants Platform. ‣ Enhanced ETH & BTC Volatility Strategies ‣ Conservative, Balanced & Aggressive Risk Profiles Available for each strategy to match investor risk-appetite. History of your project. Core Team The core team of Kvants.ai comprises Venture Capitalists, Serial Entrepreneurs, and Wall Street Investment Bankers, creating a perfect synergy of talent to develop a user-facing investment platform. Kvants.ai enables retail investors to diversify their portfolios with alternative approaches to alpha generation, via the following Strategies developed by Hedge Funds and made available exclusively to retail clients of the Kvants Platform: ✅ Available Strategies: AI-USDT: Volatility-based short term strategy AI-BTC: Enhanced BTC Volatility Short Term Strategy AI-ETH: Enhanced ETH Volatility Short Term Strategy 🖥️ Alpha Main-Net Version of the Kvants Platform Ready 💰 First AI-Driven Trading Strategy with $51M AUM with institutional investors On-Boarded and tokenized on the Kvants Platform! What’s next for your project? IDO New Strategies to be launched KVNT Staking Tier Access What can your token be used for? 📊 The $KVNT Utility Token is placed at the epicenter of the Kvants Ecosystem 🛠️$KVNT Platform Access Tier 🛠️NFT Marketplace fee discounts 🛠️KvantDAO & Voting Rights 🛠️$KVNT Dividend - Staking
